remarks: Dropping a nested consequent.  This theorem is one of two reversions of ~ ja .  Since ~ ja is reversible, one can conclude, that a nested (chain of) implication(s) is just a packed notation of two or more theorems/ hypotheses with a common consequent. ~ axc5c7 is an instance of this idea.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 4-Oct-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-jarli.1 $e |- ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ch ) $.
wl-jarli $p |- ( -. ph -> ch ) $.
